text: , also known as 札大 (Satsu-dai) for an abbreviation, is a private university in Sapporo, Japan. It was founded in 1967. In 2018, 2775 students were enrolled at the university, including 103 foreign students. ==Teaching staff== *Yūtokutaishi Akiyama, artist *Carlo Forlivesi, composer *Tama Morita, writer ==Junior college== The junior college department was established in 1968. ==Alumni== *Kazuya Kawabata, footballer *Shoji Mitarai(Ph.D), Visiting Scholar at Harvard University (assisted with Japan Ministry of Education's Negotiation Research project grant); Chairman of Japan Institute of Negotiation,& On the committee for the America-Japan Society of Hokkaido. On the drums for the Hokkaido Ventures. ==References== ==External links== *Sapporo University official site Category:Universities and colleges in Sapporo Category:Private universities and colleges in Japan Category:Hokkaido American Football Association
title: Sapporo University
